snippet: A vote in Parliament on Thursday will come days before  William Ruto, the deputy president, is scheduled to go to trial on a charge of crimes against humanity.
abstract: Kenya's Parliament will meet to vote on whether to pull out of International Criminal Court, ahead of human rights abuse trial of Deputy Pres William Ruto.
lead_paragraph: A vote in Parliament on Thursday will come days before  William Ruto, the deputy president, is scheduled to go to trial on a charge of crimes against humanity.

headline.main: Kenya Considers Leaving International Criminal Court
headline.print_headline:
Kenya: Lawmakers to Vote on Leaving
International Criminal Court

keywords.value: War Crimes, Genocide and Crimes Against Humanity
keywords.name: subject
